name: White Space (Alyx Jones)
description:
White Space

You are a Space Post Delivery System on your way about the galaxy, travelling from planet to planet. Clues in the letters lead you to your next location.

Controls: A and D to orbit the planet you're currently on. Space Bar to fire into space. You can click the mouse to direct your travel direction. If you get lost there is a white circle to follow!

Developed in 48 hours as part of the "Other Worlds" Game Jam: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/game-jam-other-worlds-tickets-37466504323#

Theme info:

Wells in Woking is a series of events held throughout September to celebrate the life and works of H. G. Wells, who lived in Woking while writing some of his most well-known novels. This jam is running alongside those events, to help further spread the spirit of Wells' works: exploration, science, and looking to the stars.

The goal is therefore to make something which embodies the idea of exploring the unknown: seeing strange and distant worlds, embracing the new, or delving into the weird and wonderful things that lie outside the realms of our day to day lives.

We were happy to win the Acoustics Award: for creative or interesting use of sound/design/music/voice-over.

Credits

Reece Banbury - Code

Sam Hayhurst - Code

Richard Tongeman - Art

Alex Jones - Music & Narrative

Holley Gray - Sound Design/Dialogue Editing

Lorraine Ansell - Narrative & Voice of Nerik

Ally Murphy - Voice of Zefhira
